Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class DevelopmentCardSlots

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedDevelopmentCardSlots
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.DevelopmentCardSlots
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DevelopmentCardSlots
extends RedDevelopmentCardSlots
DevelopmentCardSlots Class defines methods used on the Model to modify the player's Development Card Slots.
